attributes.action: RE-OPEN YOUTH CLUBS AND COMMUNITY CENTRES IN THE UK.
attributes.additional_details:
We are losing our youth to gangs, violence and grime culture,

We have lost 250 youths in 2019 and 256 in 2020 to knife crime.

1 young person lost is too much.

Every life is precious and deserve a real chance at life and all life has to offer them.

We as a country have lost the interests of our young people and they are turning away from the positive attraction of life,

We are all victims of society and of a government that can do a lot more for its society.
attributes.background: We want you to invest in youth clubs, resources and community centres in every Borough in the UK.

rejection.details:
Public buildings, including community centres, can remain open in all areas: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/local-restriction-tiers-what-you-need-to-know

Deciding whether and how to reopen centres that have been closed is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to provide additional funding for community centres and youth clubs due to Covid-19, to ensure they are able to reopen, if that is what you want to happen.
